title: Monitor Vessel Traffic in the Channel
description: A VTS operator is monitoring vessel traffic and must manage a situation where two vessels are on a potential collision course.

tasks.description: Identify two vessels on the VTS screen with a close CPA (Closest Point of Approach).
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator's system alerts to a potential conflict between two vessels.

tasks.description: Contact both vessels via VHF radio to confirm they are aware of each other's position and intentions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Operator establishes communication with both vessel masters.

tasks.description: Instruct the outbound vessel to slightly reduce speed to ensure safe passing distance.
tasks.expected_outcome: The outbound vessel confirms they are reducing speed, and the VTS operator sees the CPA increase to a safe distance.
